parameter.name: numberPre
parameter.description: Prefix for the number of the delivery note.

parameter.name: number
parameter.description: Sequential number of the delivery note.

parameter.name: numberLength
parameter.description: Minimum length of the delivery note.

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: Label to describe the delivery note.

parameter.name: note
parameter.description: Explanatory note for the delivery note.

parameter.name: offerId
parameter.description: Offer Id of the delivery note.

parameter.name: confirmationId
parameter.description: The ID of the confirmation, if the delivery note was created from a confirmation.

parameter.name: invoiceId
parameter.description: The ID of the invoice, if the delivery note was created from an invoice.

parameter.name: deliveryNoteItems
parameter.description: An array of items to be delivered.
